title: Beauty queen raised funds for refugees in need
description: Beauty queen Lee Yvonne raised money to help refugees struggling during the global spread of novel corona virus. Lee said, “I read reports that many people have lost their jobs and source of income, so I decided to do my part to help.”
content: The refugee families are from Myanmar, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh most of them are single mothers, broken families and even victims of previous abuse and rape cases. With the money collected, the stunning beauty brought provisions for the families and… [+56 chars]
